products.title: Snow White Gloss Perfect Fit
products.description: Clipping direct to the window, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors. Aluminium blinds are their most hard wearing style, ideal for busy or humid spaces. Their pure snow white blind offers a sleek hue with a glossy high-beam finish, for a spotlessly clean look. Struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Cellular Blackout Warm White Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Cellular pleated blinds are given their namesake because their 'celluar shade' is made of layers bonded together to creae honey-comb shaped pockets which trap air inside and limit heat transfer from the window. These pockets create the attractive pleating effect on the front and slow down the heat loss in your room. If you're looking for energy efficient blinds, celluar pleated blinds are effective at keeping your house warm during the winter and cool during the summer.
